alldb.table_sql: SELECT ID, RENT_LIST AS RENTLIST, PLAN_DATE AS PLANDATE, RENT AS RENT, CORPUS AS CORPUS, INTEREST AS INTEREST, CORPUS_OVERAGE AS CORPUSOVERAGE, CORPUS_BUSINESS AS CORPUSBUSINESS, INTEREST_BUSINESS AS INTERESTBUSINESS, cautionmoney_Remain cautionmoneyRemain, RENT_ADJUST AS RENTADJUST, YEAR_RATE AS yearrate FROM PROJ_FUND_RENT_PLAN WHERE PROJ_ID='{proj_id}' <EXTRACTEND> ORDER BY RENTLIST<EXTRACTEND>
